rukus.text: wama takunu fi shanin wama tatlu min'hu min qur'anin wala taʿmaluna min ʿamalin illa kunna ʿalaykum shuhudan idh tufiduna fihi wama yaʿzubu ʿan rabbika min mith'qali dharratin fi l-ardi wala fi l-samai wala asghara min dhalika wala akbara illa fi kitabin mubinin
ala inna awliyaa l-lahi la khawfun ʿalayhim wala hum yahzanuna
lahumu l-bush'ra fi l-hayati l-dun'ya wafi l-akhirati la tabdila likalimati l-lahi dhalika huwa l-fawzu l-ʿazimu
wala yahzunka qawluhum inna l-ʿizata lillahi jamiʿan huwa l-samiʿu l-ʿalimu
ala inna lillahi man fi l-samawati waman fi l-ardi wama yattabiʿu alladhina yadʿuna min duni l-lahi shurakaa in yattabiʿuna illa l-zana wa-in hum illa yakhrusuna
huwa alladhi jaʿala lakumu al-layla litaskunu fihi wal-nahara mub'siran inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yasmaʿuna
qalu ittakhadha l-lahu waladan sub'hanahu huwa l-ghaniyu lahu ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi in ʿindakum min sul'tanin bihadha ataquluna ʿala l-lahi ma la taʿlamuna
qul inna alladhina yaftaruna ʿala l-lahi l-kadhiba la yuf'lihuna
mataʿun fi l-dun'ya thumma ilayna marjiʿuhum thumma nudhiquhumu l-ʿadhaba l-shadida bima kanu yakfuruna
